{props.input.item1.title}

); } const list_element = { width: "80%", height: "250px", backgroundColor: "#EEEEEE", padding: "25px" } const left_area = { width: "175px", height: "250px", float: "left" } const center_area = { width: "40%", height: "250px", float: "left" } const right_area = { width: "20%", height: "350px", float: "right" } const title_text = { fontSize: "30pt" } const rating_text = { fontSize: "20pt" } export default ListView
